comment: Wrong facts depicted about Uday Bhan in " Tanhaji " movie . Here is true personality of him from reliable sources which is in complete contrast as shown in movie . Maratha chroniclers of those time in their own records call Uday Bhan an Intrepid man ( synonymous with honorable man ) . <URL>
amr:
# ::snt Wrong facts depicted about Uday Bhan in " Tanhaji " movie . Here is true personality of him from reliable sources which is in complete contrast as shown in movie . Maratha chroniclers of those time in their own records call Uday Bhan an Intrepid man ( synonymous with honorable man ) . <URL>
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (f / fact
            :ARG1-of (w / wrong-04)

                        :name (n / name
                              :op1 "Tanhaji"))))
      :snt2 (p / personality
            :ARG1-of (t / true-01)
            :poss (p2 / person
                  :name (n2 / name
                        :op1 "Uday"
                        :op2 "Bhan"))
            :source (s / source
                  :ARG1-of (r / rely-01
                        :ARG1-of (p3 / possible-01)))
            :ARG1-of (c / contrast-01
                  :ARG2 (s2 / show-01
                        :ARG1 p
                        :location (m3 / movie))
                  :ARG1-of (c2 / complete-02)))
      :snt3 (c3 / call-01
            :ARG0 (p4 / person
                  :ARG0-of (h / have-org-role-91
                        :ARG1 (c4 / criminal-organization
                              :name (n3 / name
                                    :op1 "Maratha"))
                        :ARG3 (c5 / chronicler))
                  :time (t2 / time
                        :mod (t3 / that)))
            :ARG1 p2
            :ARG2 (m4 / man
                  :mod (ii / intrepid)
                  :ARG1-of (s3 / synonymous
                        :prep-with (m5 / man
                              :ARG1-of (h2 / honorable-03)))))
      :snt4 (u / url))

comment: Uday Bhan Rathore was in the same position vis-a-vis Mughals as Shivaji's dad Shahaji was wrt Bijapur Sultanate . Yet Udaybhan Rathore is a monster & Shahaji is just a good daddy .
